One sunny morning, the world woke up to a bizarre phenomenon: the oceans had transformed into sparkling lemonade. People rushed to the shores, cups in hand, eager to taste the unexpected delight. Scientists scrambled to explain the change, discovering that a rare cosmic event had infused the waters with citrusy essence. As beachgoers celebrated, a group of children decided to build a lemonade stand on the sand, selling the fizzy drink to curious tourists. However, as the sun set, the oceans began to bubble and churn. The children realized they had to save their lemonade from being lost forever, leading to an adventurous race against time.
